import React, { FunctionComponent, useState } from 'react'; import Skin from '../../models/skin' import './style.css' type Props = { skin: Skin }; type Field = { value?: any, error?: string, isValid?: boolean } type Form = { peau: Field, cheveux: Field, habits_1: Field, habits_2: Field, habits_3: Field; coiffe: Field, cape: Field, bouclier: Field, costume: Field, familier: Field } const SkinForm: FunctionComponent = ({ skin }) => { const [form, setForm] = useState
({ peau: { value: skin.color[0], isValid: true }, cheveux: { value: skin.color[1], isValid: true }, habits_1: { value: skin.color[2], isValid: true }, habits_2: { value: skin.color[3], isValid: true }, habits_3: { value: skin.color[4], isValid: true }, coiffe: { value: skin.object[2], isValid: true }, cape: { value: skin.object[1], isValid: true }, bouclier: { value: skin.object[0], isValid: true }, costume: { value: skin.object[3], isValid: true }, familier: { value: skin.object[4], isValid: true } }); const classList: string[] = [ 'Zobal', 'Iop', 'Sram', 'Ouginak', 'Eniripsa', 'Steamer', 'Enutrof', 'Cra', 'Roublard', 'Sacrieur', 'Eliotrope', 'Xelor', 'Pandawa', 'Feca', 'Forgelance', 'Osamodas', 'Sadida', 'Ecaflip' ]; const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { const fieldname: string = e.target.name; const fieldValue: string = e.target.value; const newField: Field = { [fieldname]: { value: fieldValue }}; setForm({...form, ...newField}); } return (

); }; export default SkinForm;
